mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ems.workinfo (contractID, workMonth, workStartDay, workEndDay, workTime, workInfoFile, insertDate, updateDate) SELECT contractID, #{workMonth}, #{workStartDay}, #{workEndDay}, #{workTime}, #{workInfoFile}, CURDATE(), NULL FROM ems.contract WHERE employeeID = #{employeeID} AND status = '1'
mapper.select: SELECT c.contractID as contractID, e.employeeID as employeeID, e.employeeName as employeeName, w.workMonth as workMonth, w.workStartDay as workStartDay, w.workEndDay as workEndDay, w.workTime as workTime FROM ems.workinfo w INNER JOIN ems.contract c ON w.contractID = c.contractID INNER JOIN ems.employee e ON c.employeeID = e.employeeID WHERE e.employeeID = #{employeeID} AND w.workMonth = #{workMonth}
mapper.update: UPDATE ems.workinfo SET workStartDay = #{workStartDay}, workEndDay = #{workEndDay}, workTime = #{workTime}, workInfoFile = #{workInfoFile}, updateDate = CURDATE() WHERE workMonth = #{workMonth} AND contractID IN ( SELECT contractID FROM ems.contract WHERE employeeID = #{employeeID} )
